sentence.Network_en: This book has a foreword by the President.
sentence.Network_cn: 这本书有一篇总统作的序言.

sentence.Network_en: That book has a preface, not a foreword.
sentence.Network_cn: 那本书有序文, 没有前言.

sentence.Network_en: She has written the foreword to a book of recipes.
sentence.Network_cn: 她为一本食谱写了前言。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 19th cent.: from fore- + word, on the pattern of German Vorwort

entry.def: The foreword to a book is an introduction by the author or by someone else.

means.word_mean: 1. a short introductory essay preceding the text of a book
